com.facebook.react.bridge

类 ReactContextBaseJavaModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactContextBaseJavaModule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    NativeModule
    直接已知子类:
    AccessibilityInfoModule, AndroidInfoModule, AnimationsDebugModule, AppStateModule, AsyncStorageModule, BlobModule, CameraRollManager, DatePickerDialogModule, DeviceEventManagerModule, DialogModule, FileReaderModule, FrescoModule, HeadlessJsTaskSupportModule, ImageEditingManager, ImageLoaderModule, ImageStoreManager, IntentModule, JSCHeapCapture, JSCSamplingProfiler, JSDevSupport, LocationModule, NativeAnimatedModule, NetInfoModule, NetworkingModule, PermissionsModule, ShareModule, StatusBarModule, TimePickerDialogModule, Timing, ToastModule, UIManagerModule, VibrationModule, WebSocketModule

    public abstract class ReactContextBaseJavaModule
extends BaseJavaModule
    Base class for Catalyst native modules that require access to the ReactContext instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getReactApplicationContext

        protected final ReactApplicationContext getReactApplicationContext()
        Subclasses can use this method to access catalyst context passed as a constructor

      • getCurrentActivity

        @Nullable
protected final android.app.Activity getCurrentActivity()
        Get the activity to which this context is currently attached, or null if not attached. DO NOT HOLD LONG-LIVED REFERENCES TO THE OBJECT RETURNED BY THIS METHOD, AS THIS WILL CAUSE MEMORY LEAKS. For example, never store the value returned by this method in a member variable. Instead, call this method whenever you actually need the Activity and make sure to check for null.
